text: Ciutat Meridiana is a station on line 11 of the Barcelona Metro. Built in 2003, this single-platform station is located 50 metres below the surface, with three high-speed elevators linking the platform to the single access at Avinguda Rasos de Peguera. ==See also== *List of Barcelona Metro stations ==External links== *Ciutat Meridiana (trenscat.cat) Category:Transport in Nou Barris
title: Ciutat Meridiana (Barcelona Metro)
